column4: Hi! Can anyone help me get my Ipod to mount onto Hardy Heron? I've tried every single tutorial online, but for some reason it won't mount, show up on any software, or show up on the desktop when plugged in!
it doesn't even show up on the desktop?
Nope. I kept reading that there should be an icon that shows up, but I've never see it!
is the ipod plugged in now?
Yup
is it showing "Do not disconnect" or whatever, so its telling itself that its connected?
Yeah, it charges and everything.
Does it make a difference that it's an Ipod Touch?
uh, yes.
the ipod touch's havef some issues w/ linux.
google ipod touch and ubuntu, and it will show up most likely.. normal ipods work fine
Well, that makes sense!  See, I kept reading that it would work like the others, so I kept assuming that it would.
not the touch.. the touches.. i think its a firmware issue...
Ah....whew. Ok. That gives me a piece of mind that it's not me.  Ha ha
try looking here, ... http://www.linuxforums.org/forum/ubuntu-help/119543-mount-ipod-touch-ubuntu-8-04-a.html
but to my knowledge, they still dont' work.. they didn't as of the Gutsy, i know that, so maybe they dont work in hardy yet either
Thanks a lot!
no prob.. good luck on that.. i've not heard much success w/ the Touch's
oddly enough,t he MS players work better than the Touch's.. which is kinda comical when you think about it.
Yeah, but at least I know that its an issue right now that will come in time rather than me just making mistakes everywhere. :)
very true.
